root.name: Spellforce 2: Faith in Destiny
root.description: OverviewSpellforce 2: Faith in Destiny is a role playing game developed by JoWood Productions Software and published by EA Phenomic for the PC platform.System RequirementsOS: Windows速 2000, XP, Vista 32BitCPU: Intel Pentium速 4 1.5GHzRAM: 512 MB RAMVIDEO: 3D Graphics Card with 128 MB RAM (compatible with GeForce 4 Ti or higher)SOUND: DirectX速 compatibleDirectX速 9.0c
